thread.title: Fantastic Decor & Afternoon Tea
thread.title_full: Fantastic Decor & Afternoon Tea - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: msandrealove
title: Fantastic Decor & Afternoon Tea
text: We went here for Afternoon tea. Attention to detail was great and the service was amazing! Juan (who was our waiter) was lovely. I would definitely come back. The scones were cooked to perfection and the hibiscus tea was divine. It is a dog friendly place and theres a separate afternoon tea menu for them! This is a proper 5* place.
